author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008958

Introducing Project Justice and Plasma Sword: Nightmare of Bilstein, included in Capcom Fighting Collection 2!
----------
Project Justice
An intense story unfolds on the high school campus of this 3D fighter. This sequel to Rival Schools ensures justice is served with its 3-on-3 team battles! Devastate opponents with a cooperative Party-Up technique powered by your faith in your friends!

Plasma Sword: Nightmare of Bilstein
3D fighter Star Gladiator returns for a thrilling, out-of-this-world sequel! Battle as a galactic hero wielding a sword powered by plasma. Use character-specific Plasma Fields to briefly overwhelm your opponents, or unleash a Plasma Strike that devastates with a dazzling display. The enthralling story that unfolds in the cutscenes is not to be missed!
----------
 
The fight continues in Capcom Fighting Collection 2, packed with 8 iconic fighting games from across Capcom's history! Get ready to battle on May 16,
title: Capcom Fighting Collection 2 - Game Spotlight Trailer | PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/indiana-jones-and-the-great-circle/

Ever wonder what it's like performing in a video game? Go behind-the-scenes with the Great Circle's cast as they discuss their experience with motion capture.  

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is coming to PlayStation® 5 on April 17th. Play up to 2 days early with the Premium Edition. 

#ps5 #ps5games #indianajonesandthegreatcircle
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - Capturing the Adventure | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Wishlist now: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008749

The legendary Space Pirate is back! Prepare to fight the Pirate Guild and relive the thrills of the iconic anime in Space Adventure Cobra - The Awakening, landing on PlayStation 5 on August 26th!

Dive into a fast-paced action-platformer set in a rich and varied sci-fi universe. Use your gadgets to get out of dangerous situations and master your Psychogun to bend your shots for even greater effectiveness.

#ps5 #ps5games #spaceadventure
title: Space Adventure Cobra - The Awakening - Anime Trailer | PS5 Games
